content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TSPARMCD
      operator: longer_than
      value: 8
Core:
  Id: CORE-000147
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Trigger error when length of TSPARMCD is greater than 8
Outcome:
  Message: Length of TSPARMCD is greater than 8
  Output Variables:
    - TSPARM
    - TSPARMCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0257
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: TSPARMCD (the companion to TSPARM) is limited to 8
                  characters and does not have special character restrictions.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.4.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TS

json.Description: Trigger error when length of TSPARMCD is greater than 8

Outcome.Message: Length of TSPARMCD is greater than 8

Citations.Cited_Guidance: TSPARMCD (the companion to TSPARM) is limited to 8 characters and does not have special character restrictions.
